name: Ding Dong Ditcher
description:
You are a Cool Teen in the 90s (2090), with your trusty hoverboard and your compressed air rock thrower you start your personal journey to bother everyone in your neighborhood. You start Ding Dong ditching until a Police man starts to follow you, will you get caught or lose to your own rules first. 

FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE DOWNLOAD (somethings don't appear on WebGL)

Controls: 

W, A or <- -> keys: Speed Control (To get away from the police man -> or D, to slow Down <- or A) 

Space Bar: Shoot rock

HOW TO PLAY:

if(NOT ON EASY MODE)

{

      // IF you miss 10 Bells you lose

}

//IF you get caught by the Police Man you lose (with or without Easy mode)

//MAKE SURE YOU CHECK THE "Settings / Controls" tab on the start menu
